description: A yummy low carb snack that's simple to make.
keywords: Cheesecake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Baking,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Blueberry Cheesecake Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup frozen blueberries (can use fresh if desired)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 165Â°C and line slice tin with aluminium foil.
Using an electric mixer, mix all ingredients (excluding blueberries) together.
Pour mixture into prepared slice tin. Place blueberries on top of mixture and push in slightly.
Cook in oven until golden brown, approximately 45 minutes. Remove from oven, let it cool before cutting into 12 slices. Enjoy!
